inclusion.criterion: COPD diagnosis by health care provider
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Chronic bronchitis, defined as chronic cough with daily sputum production
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: ≥2 COPD exacerbations within the last year
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Obstructive sleep apnea and using positive airway pressure treatment
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients that use oxygen supplementation continuously (patients that use oxygen supplementation only at exertion will NOT be excluded)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has COPD and is on O2, but also has obstructive sleep apnea and uses positive airway pressure treatment.
